violation.title: Version of dependencies should be fixed

violation.title: Text files should end with a newline character
violation.message: This file ends with no newline character. It won't render properly on a terminal, and it's considered a bad practice. Add a simple line feed as the last character to fix it.

violation.title: Commented code should not be committed
violation.message: Commented out code reduces readability and lowers the code confidence for other developers. If it's common usage for debug, it should not be committed. Using a version control system, such code can be safely removed.

violation.title: Deprecated class found in service definition
violation.message: The event_dispatcher service uses the Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\ContainerAwareEventDispatcher class, which has been deprecated in Symfony 3.3. Use the Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\EventDispatcher class instead.

violation.title: .htaccess should be avoided
violation.message: A .htaccess file has been spotted. You should consider moving it to the server configuration to improve global performances.

violation.title: Default favicon should be changed
violation.message: Default default HiDPI Symfony favicon found. This reveals the backend engine of the application and makes it more vulnerable to attackers. Consider using a custom favicon instead - plus, your users will memorize your application more easily.
